#summary Details of implementation-specific things on funcsim.

= Things to implement =

 * Command line parsing:  *getopt* on Linux/Windows

 * ELF loading - external libelf on Linux/Windows/CygWin

 * User intercative interface - external *libreadline* support on Linux/Windows

 * Stack trace printing on errors - cross compiler implementations required.

 * Disassembling
   * At first it should disassemble only stuff it can decode
   * Unknown instructions may be just printed as HEX code.
